Key Match Events: England led early but was left hanging on for a 1-1 draw at the Waldstadion in Frankfurt
Pre-Game Insights: Prince William is president of the English Football Association and a regular spectator at games played by the team, known as the Three Lions
Post-Match Reflections: Neither team won but there was little doubt that Denmark had played better
Others: King Frederik X and Prince William shook hands on a draw between their national teams at the European Championship in men's soccer on Thursday
